>
[Reinforced Chassis](/Feats.aspx?ID=3095) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Automaton" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=398" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 40</row>

</column>

---

Your body is designed to be particularly resilient. Your chassis is medium armor in the plate armor group that grants a +4 item bonus to AC, a Dex cap of +1, a check penalty of –2, a speed penalty of –5 feet, and a Strength value of 16. You can never wear other armor or remove your chassis; however, you still don't become [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15) from sleeping. Finally, you can etch armor runes onto your chassis as normal.

**Enhancement** Your chassis becomes difficult to overcome. You gain the Chassis Deflection reaction.
